name: generate-export-aliases
description: Generates additional files to make requiring files deep in your node module easy and safe from refactoring.

scripts.test: lint && mocha --reporter spec --require test/bootstrap test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/bootstrap test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js
scripts.semantic-release: semantic-release pre && npm publish && semantic-release post
